response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations and contribute to its growth. Our product, while valued at $1,500,000 to us, offers unparalleled benefits and capabilities that are worth far more than its cost. Given its value to you, we are offering it at a special introductory price of $1,200,000.

This exceptional opportunity allows you to secure an asset that could potentially increase your revenue and streamline your processes. We understand that such a significant investment requires careful consideration, so we are also providing a comprehensive consultation service to help you understand how this product can be tailored to meet your specific needs and maximize its impact on your company.

Please let us know if you have any questions or need further information. We are confident that this product will be a valuable addition to your business and look forward to the possibility of working with you.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
